Package pizzapazza.math.geometricshape

Class Z4GeometricShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizzapazza.math.geometricshape.Z4GeometricShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Z4JSONable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Z4AbstractBezierCurve, Z4GeometricCurve, Z4GeometricShapeSequence, Z4Line, Z4Polyline, Z4SinglePointShape
    public abstract class Z4GeometricShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements Z4JSONable
    The common interface of all geometric shapes (and paths)
    Author:
    gianpiero.diblasi

      • connect

        public Z4GeometricShape connect​(Z4GeometricShape shape,
                                int width,
                                int height)
        Returns a Z4GeometricShape obtained by connecting this geometric shape with another geometric shape by means of a bezier curve
        Parameters:
        shape - The other shape
        width - The available area width
        height - The available area height
        Returns:
        The new geometric shape

      • isPath

        public abstract boolean isPath()
        Checks if this geometric shape is a path (it is not closed)
        Returns:
        true this geometric shape is a path (it is not closed), false otherwise

      • getControlPointConnections

        public abstract def.js.Array<java.lang.Integer> getControlPointConnections()
        Returns the connections between the control points
        Returns:
        The connections between the control points, as an array where even positions contains the indices of the starting point of the connections and odd positions contains the indices of the ending point of the connections

      • fromDataChanged

        public abstract Z4GeometricShape fromDataChanged​(def.js.Array<Z4Point> controlPoints,
                                                 double x,
                                                 double y,
                                                 int pointIndex,
                                                 double spinnerValue,
                                                 int spinnerIndex,
                                                 int width,
                                                 int height)
        Returns a Z4GeometricShape obtained by this Z4GeometricShape when a data (point or spinner) is changed
        Parameters:
        controlPoints - The control points
        x - The x-axis coordinate of the changed point
        y - The y-axis coordinate of the changed point
        pointIndex - The index of the changed point, -1 if no point is changed
        spinnerValue - The changed spinner value
        spinnerIndex - The index of the changed spinner value, -1 if no spinner is changed
        width - The available area width
        height - The available area height
        Returns:
        The geometric shape

      • fromResize

        public Z4GeometricShape fromResize​(int width,
                                   int height)
        Returns a Z4GeometricShape obtained after a canvas resize in order to fit the new dimensions
        Parameters:
        width - The new width
        height - The new height
        Returns:
        The geometric shape

      • fromRotation

        public abstract Z4GeometricShape fromRotation​(double cx,
                                              double cy,
                                              double angle)
        Returns a Z4GeometricShape obtained by rotating this geometric shape
        Parameters:
        cx - The x-axis coordinate of the rotation center
        cy - The y-axis coordinate of the rotation center
        angle - The angle (in radians)
        Returns:
        The geometric shape
